Suddenly the howl was heard again, much closer. So close that it sounded 
like it was right behind Neody.

>::Neody::
>
>Neody looks toward the direction where the scream had come from. It
>had curled his mech fluid, and he didn't think that whatever had made
>that scream was very happy now.
>
>"Ramjet, do you want anyone to check out what's up with that scream?"
>he asks Ramjet over the comm, beginning to feel uncomfortable in the
>open.
>
>
>
>
>--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Johnny Brennan" <thejerkyboysare@h...> wrote:
> > Suddenly, a mech fluid curdling howl could be heard in the distance
>followed
> > by an insane laugh that was even worse than the howl.
